claims.quote: Super-Pharm's demand forecasting is up to 10 times more efficient now.
Our accuracy has improved to 90%, when it was previously about 50%
Online sales recently surpassed brick-and-mortar revenue for Super-Pharm, Israel's leading drugstore.

claims.claim: Reduced staffing requirements for demand forecasting
claims.quote: Before using Vertex AI, Super-Pharm relied on an eight-person, in-house team for demand forecasting, along with placing much of the logistical burden on in-store employees and managers. Vertex AI enabled Super-Pharm to sharpen their accuracy, create inventory predictions far more quickly and efficiently, and ease the burden on their employees.

To optimize customer experience and boost sales on their ecommerce site, Super-Pharm needed to guarantee that consumers could select in-stock products, purchase them, and ship the items to the brick-and-mortar store nearest to them within 24 hours.

claims.claim: Prevented revenue loss from missing items
claims.quote: on-premise tools were unable to keep up with predicting customers' demand and thus managing inventory requirements. This resulted in potential loss of revenue due to missing items.
